actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 53 of title 5, United States Code, to include the position of Commissioner, Automated Data and Telecommunications Service, General Services Administration, in level V of the Executive Schedule.

summary.text: Includes the position of Commissioner, Automated Data and Telecommunications Service, General Services Administration, in level V of the Executive Schedule.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 53 of title 5, United States Code, to include the position of Commissioner, Automated Data and Telecommunications Service, General Services Administration, in level V of the Executive Schedule.
